Name: Tradewind Rider
Text: Flying\n{T}, Tap two untapped creatures you control: Return target permanent to its owner's hand.

Name: Hammer of Bogardan
Text: Hammer of Bogardan deals 3 damage to any target.\n{2}{R}{R}{R}: Return Hammer of Bogardan from your graveyard to your hand. Activate only during your upkeep.
